summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3934 for the improvement of Ferdinand Street from Beacon Avenue to 28th Avenue South; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47910, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
